markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Enhance Senses](/Spells.aspx?ID=1116)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 93

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You enhance the target's senses. The target gains [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416), and all of the target's [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) senses have their distances doubled. If the target already has low-light vision, they gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).

---
**Heightened (+2)**  The number of targets increases by 1.
name: Enhance Senses

If the target already has low-light vision, they gain darkvision. --- Heightened (+2) The number of targets increases by 1.
